output:
The genius of the crowd.
There is enough treachery, hatred, violence, absurdity, and the average human being to supply any given army on any given day.
And the best at murder are those who preach against it.
And the best at hate are those who preach love.
And the best at war, finally, are those who preach hate.
Those who preach God need God.
Those who preach peace do not have peace.
Those who preach love do not have love.
Beware the preacher.
Beware the knower.
Beware those who are always reading books.
Beware those who either detest poverty or are proud of it.
Beware those who quit to pray for they need praise in return.
Beware those who quickly surrender to their phrase of liberation.
Beware those who are always reading books.
Beware the preacher.
Beware those who quickly surrender to their phrase of liberation.
